channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Copilot Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Copilot Studio

item.title: CVE-2024-38206|2024-08-20T18:15:53.415Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20copilot%20studio
item.description: An authenticated attacker can bypass Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) protection in Microsoft Copilot Studio to leak sensitive information over a network.
